basic_information.scholarship_name: Whitesell Family Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry

description: This scholarship honors retired Chemistry instructor Lane Whitesell and the Whitesell family. This scholarship is created to provide assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science who are pursuing a degree in the Department of Chemistry. The recipient(s) of the Whitesell Family Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry will be selected by a committee appointed by the Dean of the College of Mathematics and Science and will include representatives from the Department of Chemistry. The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution the following fall and/or spring semesters. Eligibility Requirements Preference given to an Undergraduate student majoring in Chemistry Education Graduate student pursuing a Masters in Education with a minor in Chemistry Must be enrolled full-time Minimum of 2.5 GPA

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
